title: Hour 3 - (06-01-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - (06-01-20)
description:
Players aren't weaponizing the George Floyd incident, they're personalizing it, and sport teams are looking at hefty cost to get seasons underway, with precautionary testing for Covid 19. NFL looking at upwards of $10 Million for possibly 60K test.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
